actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the missing in action in Southeast Asia and the Paris Agreement.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Government should endeavor to make all parties signatory to the Paris Peace Agreement and the agreement with the Lao Patriotic Front comply with the provisions of those agreements. Calls upon the President and the Secretary of State to take steps to determine the fate of all United States servicemen and civilians missing in Southeast Asia.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the missing in action in Southeast Asia and the Paris Agreement.
